body:
Have an invention or product idea?



Give your Idea



In July 2006 Davison was awarded two prestigious Industrial Design Excellence Awards from the Industrial Design Society of America for The BikeBoard and The Hover Creeper. Awards were announced in the July 10, 2006 issue of BusinessWeek Magazine.


Davison provides services to professionally prepare and present product ideas to potential licensees. Some services are provided for a contingent fee, or a percentage of royalties obtained by the client, and some services are provided for an upfront fee paid by the client.To no longer receive messages from Davison, Inc., please go here or send a letter to Davison, Inc. RIDC Park,595 Alpha Dr.Pittsburgh, PA 15238-2911 







Exclude me
